claim(uint256,address).details: This function allows users to withdraw a specific token from a mature safe.      - Checks if the safe has matured.      - Transfers the specified token to the user.      - Updates the safe's token balance.      - Emits a Claimed event.

params._tokenAddress: The address of the token to claim

claimAll(uint256).details: This function allows users to withdraw all tokens from a mature safe.      - Checks if the safe has matured.      - Transfers all tokens to the user.      - Updates the safe's token balances.      - Emits Claimed events for each token.

claimableBalance(uint256).details: This function allows users to view the claimable balances of all tokens in a mature safe.

returns._0: An array of Token structs representing the claimable tokens and their balances

deleteSafe(uint256).custom:emits: SafeDeleted event with the user's address and safe ID upon successful deletion
deleteSafe(uint256).custom:reverts: If the safe is not active or contains any token balances
deleteSafe(uint256).details: This function allows users to delete their savings safe if it meets certain conditions:      - The safe must be active      - The safe must not contain any tokens (all balances must be zero)      - Upon successful deletion, all safe parameters are reset to default values

params._safeId: The ID of the safe to delete

extendSafeDuration(uint256,uint256).custom:emits: SafeDurationExtended event with the user's address, safe ID, additional time, and whether the safe was unlocked
extendSafeDuration(uint256,uint256).details: This function allows users to extend the lock-up period of their savings safe.       - If the safe is already unlocked (current time >= unlock time), the new duration starts from the current time      - If the safe is still locked, the additional time is added to the existing duration      - The function reverts if the safe doesn't exist or if the additional time is less than 30 days

params._additionalTime: The amount of time to add to the safe's duration (must be at least 30 days)
params._safeId: The ID of the safe to extend

getprematureWithdrawFeePercentage().details: Reads the premature withdrawal fee from diamond storage

returns._0: uint256 The fee percentage charged for premature withdrawals, expressed in basis points (1% = 100)

save(string,uint256,address,uint256,uint.details: this function checks if there is an already existing safe and tops it up with the amount and token. If the id doesnt return an existing safe then it creates a new one with the _target name and locks the token away to save for a specified duration. The safe will be unlocked after the specified duration. It finds the desired token and queries the user's balance to ensure the user has enough and saves it by moving it from the userAvailableBalances records to the userSavings records.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to save
params._duration: The duration for which to save the tokens
params._id: is a parameter used to check for existing safe.
params._target: is the target name given to newly created safes if id does not match any existing safe
params._token: The address of the token to save

withdrawSavings(uint256,address,uint256,.details: This function allows a user to withdraw a specific amount of a token from a safe identified by safeId.      - For emergency safes (target = "emergency"), no fee is applied regardless of maturity.      - For non-emergency safes, a 15% fee is applied on early withdrawals if accepted by the user.      - Updates user balances and total savings, records the transaction, and emits appropriate events.

params._acceptEarlyWithdrawalFee: Boolean indicating whether the user accepts the early withdrawal fee for non-emergency safes
params._amount: The amount of the token to withdraw
params._safeId: The ID of the safe from which to withdraw
params._tokenAddress: The address of the token to withdraw

claim(uint256,address).notice: Claims a specified token from a mature safe

claimAll(uint256).notice: Claims all tokens from a mature safe

claimableBalance(uint256).notice: Returns the claimable balances of all tokens in a mature safe

deleteSafe(uint256).notice: Deletes a target savings safe and releases its funds

extendSafeDuration(uint256,uint256).notice: Extends the duration of a target savings safe

getprematureWithdrawFeePercentage().notice: Get the current fee percentage charged for premature withdrawals

save(string,uint256,address,uint256,uint.notice: Save a specified amount of tokens for a specific duration

withdrawSavings(uint256,address,uint256,.notice: Withdraws a specified amount of a token from a user's savings safe
